full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'DIR ZLA BA RE RE LA GSO SBYONG 'DON PA'I GO RIM NI, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(ZHES PA ZLA BA RE RE LA GSO SBYONG 'DON PA'I SGRIGS RIM 'DI NI, DZA SAG RTA MGRIN GYI CHOS SDE CHEN PO BKRA 'PHEL RGYAS GLING GI DGE SLONG DANG DGE TSUL RNAMS LA GSO SBYONG GSAR DU BTZUGS PA'I SKABS SU CHOS GRVA CHEN PO BKRA SHIS LHUN PO'I PHYAG LEN BZHIN DU DKA' CHEN YE SHES CHOS 'PHEL GYIS BRIS PA'O, ,DGE BA 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS DUS KUN TU ZLA BA YAR GYI NGO BZHIN DU GONG NAS GONG DU 'PHEL ZHING RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
